scripts.electron:compile: tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && powershell -Command "Remove-Item dist-electron/*.cjs -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem dist-electron/*.js | ForEach-Object { $content = Get-Content $_.FullName -Raw; $content = $content -replace 'require\(\"\./server\"\)', 'require(\"./server.cjs\")'; $content = $content -replace 'require\(\"\./preload\"\)', 'require(\"./preload.cjs\")'; Set-Content ($_.FullName -replace '.js$','.cjs') $content; Remove-Item $_.FullName }"
scripts.electron:dev: npm run electron:compile && concurrently -k "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:pack: npm run build && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --dir
